entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is introduced as the caretaker who makes an unmistakable hunting cry. He is described as having rapid, shuffling footsteps and a wheezy voice.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is introduced as the caretaker who is furious about the noise made by Peeves. He has a wheezy voice and is accompanied by Mrs. Norris.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is Filch's cat and is mentioned as being with him when he finds the egg.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as a person who is hiding in the stairs using an Invisibility Cloak. He is shown on the Marauder's Map.

relationships.description: Filch is searching for Peeves, who made a noise that woke up the whole castle.
Filch found an egg at the foot of the stairs.
